messages.title: We called round today!
messages.content: Your Assembly Candidate Dawn Bowden was in your area today with your local MP Gerald Jones. We want to hear your views for Merthyr Tydfil & Rhymney. Please don't hesitate to get in touch with us and let us know how we can help.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Six pledges if you elect Dawn in May:
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Free childcare for working parents, Tax cuts for small businesses in Wales, 100,000 quality apprenticeships for all ages, New treatment fund for life threatening illnesses, Double the capital limit for those going into residential care.

issues.economy: Tax cuts for small businesses in Wales
issues.health: New treatment fund for life threatening illnesses
issues.socialWelfare: Double the capital limit for those going into residential care

politicalExperience.achievements: Welsh Labour delivered on all of our manifesto pledges to you in the last government.

images.caption: Image of Dawn Bowden, Your Assembly Candidate for Merthyr Tydfil & Rhymney.
